jogo.dica1: This arcade game is known for an urban legend that it was so popular that it caused a coin shortage in Japan in the time of it's release.
jogo.dica2: You can shoot aliens, but the red spaceship is worth more points. The game speed raises as the aliens are defeated.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo de arcade é conhecido por uma lenda urbana em que seu sucesso foi tamanho, que fez com que faltassem moedas no Japão logo após seu lançamento.
jogo.dica2br: Você pode atirar em alienígenas, mas a nave vermelha confere mais pontos. A velocidade do jogo aumenta conforme mais alienígenas são destruídos.

jogo.dica1: Both stealth and direct combat are used as means to progress in this game. To succeed, the main character also counts on many gadgets to see his way through obstacles.
jogo.dica2: In this this game, the superhero protagonist explores an asylum and defeats many of his long-time enemies along the way.
jogo.dica1br: Tanto movimentos furtivos quanto combate direto são meios de se progredir neste jogo. Para vencer desafios, o protagonista também conta com diversos acessórios especiais.
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo, o protagonista é um super-herói que explora um asilo onde ele derrota muitos de seus inimigos de longa data.

jogo.dica1: This historical fiction action-adventure open world stealth video game series is well know for using replicas of famous historical places in it's level design
jogo.dica2: This game series features an ancient society of killers that operated in different cenarios such as the Italian Renaissance, American Civil War or high-seas Pirates.
jogo.dica1br: Esta série de jogos de ficção histórica apresenta mundos abertos onde se deve realizar movimentos furtivos em certos personagens. Eles são conhecidos por suas fases com réplicas de lugares famosos.
jogo.dica2br: Esta série de jogos apresenta uma antiga sociedade de matadores que operou em cenários diferentes como a Renascença Italiana, a Guerra Civil dos Estados Unidos e até no mar, como piratas.

jogo.dica1: This game was released on 2005 for an inovative handheld device. This was one of the few games that attained the maximum score according to the Japanese game magazine named Famitsu.
jogo.dica2: This is a Nintendo game on which the player takes care of virtual dogs.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado em 2005 para um videogame portátil inovador. Este foi um dos poucos jogos que conseguiu nota máxima pela revista japonesa de jogos chamada Famitsu.
jogo.dica2br: Este é um jogo da Nintendo em que o jogador deve tomar conta de cachorros virtuais.

jogo.dica1: This is a fantasy fighting game first released on 1992 and developed by Midway. This game is known for it`s explicit violence.
jogo.dica2: Among the characters of this game, there is Sonya Blade and Johnny Cage.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de luta fantasioso que estreiou em 1992 e foi desenvolvido pela Midway. Este jogo é conhecido por sua violência explícita.
jogo.dica2br: Dois dos personagens deste jogo são Sonya Blade e Johnny Cage.

jogo.nome: The Legend of Zelda - Ocarina of Time
jogo.dica1: This game is known as one of the best games of all time. This is an adventure game on which the use of music is important to solve puzzles.
jogo.dica2: On this game, the protagonist has to become older by getting a legendary sword in order to defeat the main villain.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo é reconhecido como um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos. Se trata de um jogo de aventura em que o uso de música é importante para resover quebra-cabeças.
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo, o protagonista precisa se tornar mais velho, conseguindo uma espada lendária, para poder derrotar o vilão principal.

jogo.dica1: This is a Hack and Slash series that is exclusive to the Playstation consoles. The first game was released in 2005 for the PS2
jogo.dica2: Fight your way through many Greek legends and gods seeking revenge for your slayed family
jogo.dica1br: Esta é uma série jogos estilo Hack and Slash exclusiva para os consoles Playstation. O primeiro jogo da série foi lançado em 2005 para PS2.
jogo.dica2br: Lute contra deuses e lendas gregos para vingar a morte de sua família.

jogo.dica1: This MMORPG was developed by Blizzard Entertainment and first released on 2004. This is the MMORPG with most subscribers in the world, so far.
jogo.dica2: When the player creates a new character in this game, he/she can choose between two factions (Alliance or Horde) and between various races, such as Undead, Blood Elf, Draenei or Pandarien.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um MMORPG desenvolvido pela Blizzard Entertainment e lançado em 2004. Este é o MMORPG com maior número de jogadores.
jogo.dica2br: Quando o jogador cria um personagem neste jogo, ele pode escolher entre duas facções (Alliance ou Horde) e entre várias raças, como por exemplo Undead, Blood Elf, Draenei ou Pandaren.

jogo.dica1: This mobile game was very successful and had a lot of sequels , including a Star Wars crossover.
jogo.dica2: This physics-based puzzle game features a slingshot and pigs.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo que estreiou em celulares, fez muito sucesso e teve muitas sequências, incluindo um crossover com Star Wars.
jogo.dica2br: Este é um jogo baseado em física envolvendo um estilingue e porcos.

jogo.dica1: This ia an arcade game released in 1982 by Namco.
jogo.dica2: This game features the female version of a famous pellet-eating arcade character.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de arcade lançado em 1982 pela Namco.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo apresenta a versão feminina de um personagem famoso comedor de pastilhas.

jogo.dica1: This game is a Playstation exclusive platformer that was first realesed in 2008. It is known for featuring customizable levels.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is named Sack Boy.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de plataforma exclusivo de Playstation lançado em 2008. Ele é reconhecido por apresentar fases customizáveis.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo se chama Sack Boy.

jogo.dica1: This game features an AI companion named Cortana.
jogo.dica2: This futuristic first-person shooter features a group of soldiers named Spartans that have to fight against aliens.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo apresenta uma companheira de inteligência artificial chamada Cortana.
jogo.dica2br: Este é um jogo futurista de tiro em primeira pessoa em que um grupo de soldados chamados Spartans lutam contra alienígenas.

jogo.dica1: This First-Person Shooter released in 2007 features a range of unique genetic abilities, named Plasmids, that include incinerating and freezing enemies
jogo.dica2: Encounter Big Daddies and Little Sisters in the underwater city of Rapture
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa foi lançado em 2007. Neste jogo, há várias habilidades genéticas únicas chamadas Plasmids, que incluem o poder de incinerar ou congelar inimigos.
jogo.dica2br: Encontre Big Daddies e Little Sisters em uma cidade sub-aquática chamada Rapture.

jogo.dica1: This is the second installment of a famous Capcom survival-horror series.
jogo.dica2: This game's main characters are named Claire Redfield and Leon Kennedy.
jogo.dica1br: Este é o segundo jogo de uma série de survival-horror da Capcom.
jogo.dica2br: Os protagonistas deste jogo se chamam Claire Redfield e Leon Kennedy.

jogo.dica1: This games` hero wears unique red shoes.
jogo.dica2: This game is about a hedgehog that runs very fast. One of his nicknames is "The Blue Blur".
jogo.dica1br: O herói deste jogo usa sapatos vermelhos únicos.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo é sobre um porco-espinho que corre muito rápido. Um de seus apelidos é "O Borrão Azul".

jogo.dica1: This is one of the most acclaimed first-person shooters for the Nintendo 64 platform. It was released on 1997.
jogo.dica2: This game is based on a James Bond film released on 1995, starring Pierce Brosnan as the secret agent.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um dos mais aclamados jogos de tiro em primeira pessoa para o Nintendo 64. Ele foi lançado em 1997.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo é baseado em um filme de James Bond estrelando Pierce Brosnan lançado em 1995.

jogo.dica1: This is a simulation game that also features resource-management released for PC on 1999.
jogo.dica2: In this game, the player builds and manages various attractions on a amusement park. This game is well-known due to the fact that "accidents" may occur in the attractions, resulting in virtual deaths.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de simulação e gerenciamento lançado em 1999 para PC.
jogo.dica2br: Nesse jogo são construídos e administrados vários brinquedos e atrações de um parque de diversões. Este jogo é muito conhecido pelo fato de que podem acontecer "acidentes" em alguns brinquedos, causando mortes virtuais.

jogo.dica1: This is an indie puzzle-platformer game released in 2008 for PC and Xbox 360.
jogo.dica2: The core gameplay of this game revolves around rewinding time to solve puzzles.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo independente de plataforma e quebra-cabeças lançado em 2008 para PC e Xbox 360.
jogo.dica2br: A mecânica principal deste jogo é focada em voltar o tempo para resolver quebra-cabeças.

jogo.dica1: This game was released on 1972 and made by Atari.
jogo.dica2: This game is based on tennis and is considered to be the first game to attain mainstream popularity.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado pela Atari para arcades em 1972
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo, baseado em tênis, é considerado o primeiro jogo eletrônico a se tornar popular.

jogo.dica1: This is a very famous sandbox open-world game. The main activities available to the player are exploration, gathering resources, crafting, combat and building.
jogo.dica2: Some of this game's enemies are Zombies, the Enderman and the Creeper.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um famoso jogo "sandbox" de mundo aberto. As principais atividades disponíveis para os jogadores são explorar, juntar recursos, elaborar objetos, combater e construir.
jogo.dica2br: Alguns dos inimigos deste jogo são os Zombies, o Enderman e o Creeper.

jogo.dica1: This game was released in 2009 for Facebook. It was, at the time, the most popular Facebook game.
jogo.dica2: Some of this game's core actions are plowing land, planting, growing, and harvesting crops, harvesting trees and raising livestock.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado em 2009 para Facebook. Na época, ele foi o jogo mais popular desta rede social.
jogo.dica2br: Algumas das ações centrais deste jogo são cultivar terra, plantar e colher legumes, plantar árvores e criar gado.

jogo.dica1: This game was Mario's debut, although at the time his name was Jumpman
jogo.dica2: Universal Studios sued Nintendo because this game had many similarities with the movie King Kong
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi a estréia de Mario, embora na época seu nome fosse Jumpman.
jogo.dica2br: A Universal Studios processou a Nintendo por este jogo apresentar várias similaridades com o filme King Kong.

jogo.dica1: This is a life-simulator game developed by Nintendo and released for Gamecube on 2001.
jogo.dica2: Get your own house on a small village and then go fishing, catch bugs, dig fossils and pay your debt to Tom Nook.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de simulação desenvolvido pela Nintendo e lançado para Gamecube em 2001.
jogo.dica2br: Consiga sua própria casa em uma pequena vila e então pesque, cace insetos, escave fósseis e pague suas dívidas com Tom Nook.

jogo.dica1: This is a Lego game based on a very famous movie series.
jogo.dica2: This is a Star Wars game combined with a very famous toy franchise.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de Lego baseado em uma famosa série de filmes.
jogo.dica2br: Este é um jogo de Star Wars combinado com uma famosa marca de brinquedos.

jogo.dica1: This is a very famous first-person shooter series. The first games of the series were primarily set on World War II.
jogo.dica2: Some of this game series installments are named Modern Warfare and Black Ops.
jogo.dica1br: Esta é uma série muito famosa de jogos de tiro em primeira pessoa. Os primeiros jogos da série eram ambientados na Segunda Guerra Mundial.
jogo.dica2br: Dois dos jogos desta série são "Modern Warfare" e "Black Ops".

jogo.dica1br: Faça o que você quiser, quando quiser. Mas tome cuidado com a polícia ou até mesmo o exército.
jogo.dica2br: Também conhecido como "GTA".

jogo.dica1: This is a laserdisc arcade game released in 1983. It features animations created by ex-Disney animator Don Bluth.
jogo.dica2: In this game, Dirk the Daring must save princess Daphne from an evil dragon. It is a fully animated game and the player interacts with it through quick-time events.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado para arcades de laserdisc em 1983. Ele apresenta animações feitas por um ex-animador da Disney chamado Don Bluth.
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo, Dirk the Daring precisa salvar a princesa Daphne de um dragão maligno. Este é um jogo totalmente animado, e o jogador interage com ele através de eventos dinâmicos durante a animação.

jogo.dica1br: Jogo de tiro multiplayers desenvolvido pela Valve. Um dos jogos mais jogados da Steam, tem uma mecânica singular.
jogo.dica2br: "Heavy, Spy e Scout" são alguns dos personagens. "DOCTOR!!"

jogo.dica1: This is a real-time strategy game developed by Blizzard Entertainment and released in 2010 for PC.
jogo.dica2: This science fiction game features three species: the exiled humans (named Terrans), an ailen race capable of mental powers ( the Protoss) and an insect-like alien swarm (the Zerg).
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de estratégia em tempo real desenvolvido pela Blizzard Entertainment e lançado para PC em 2010.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo de ficção científica apresenta três espécies de seres: os humanos exilados (chamados de Terrans), uma raça alienígena com poderes mentais (os Protoss) e alienígenas semelhantes a insetos (os Zerg).

jogo.dica1: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A, Start.
jogo.dica2: Fight an alien army as you go through highly difficult side-scrolling levels. Collect power ups for your guns, such as homing missiles and flamethowers.
jogo.dica1br: Cima, cima, baixo, baixo, esquerda, direita, esquerda, direita, B, A, Start.
jogo.dica2br: Lute contra um exército alienígena percorrendo fases side-scrolling extremamente difíceis. Colete upgrades para suas armas, como mísseis tele-guiados e lança-chamas.

jogo.dica1: This game was released on 1996 with a new Nintendo console.
jogo.dica2: This is Super Mario's debut in 3D games. It's for Nintendo's 64 bit-powered console.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado em 1996 para um console da Nintendo que, na época, era novidade.
jogo.dica2br: Esta foi a estréia de Super Mario em jogos 3D. A plataforma original deste jogo é o console de 64 bits da Nintendo.

jogo.dica1: This is a NES game released in 1984. It allowed the use of a peripheral controller called the "NES Zapper" or just "Zapper" in Japan .
jogo.dica2: This game is known for featuring a dog that laugths at you each time you miss shooting the ducks.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de NES lançado em 1984 que permitiu o uso de um controle periférico chamado "NES Zapper".
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo é conhecido por ter um cão que ri do jogador toda vez que ele erra ao tentar atirar em patos.

jogo.dica1: It's a famous Nintendo 64 Action/Platform game made by Rareware and released in 1998.
jogo.dica2: A bear and a bird need to face against a wicked witch.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo famoso de ação/plataforma feito pela Rare e lançado em 1998.
jogo.dica2br: Um urso e uma ave se unem contra uma bruxa malvada.

jogo.dica1br: Esse jogo tem mais de 100 personagens diferentes para você escolher.
jogo.dica2br: "Bem-vindos a League of Draven" é uma frase muito popular dita por um dos campeões desse jogo RTS, desenvolvido pela Riot.

jogo.dica1br: Uma serie de jogos que teve inicio no Nintendo64, onde só para esse console foram lançados três títulos.
jogo.dica2br: Muito conhecido pelos seus mini-games divertidos. Deve-se acumular o máximo de estrelas e moedas para vencer seus adversários.

jogo.dica1: This is a rhythm game where the player can hit special notes to build up a Star Power meter. If he activates Star Power, his score will be doubled for a short time.
jogo.dica2: This game was sold bundled with a special peripheral controller shaped like an electric guitar.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de ritmo em que o jogador pode acertar notas especiais para encher um medidor de Star Power. Quando o medidor de Star Power está cheio, a pontuação obtida é dobrada.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo foi vendido com um controle especial em forma de guitarra.

jogo.dica1: This ia a famous mobile game released in 2010. The player must use physics-based mechanics to solve puzzles.
jogo.dica2: The objective of this game is to feed the candy to the little monster named Om Nom using touch controls to cut certain objects on the screen.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um famoso jogo para celulares lançado em 2010. O jogador deve resolver quebra-cabeças baseados na física do jogo.
jogo.dica2br: O objetivo deste jogo é dar uma bala para o pequeno monstro chamado Om Nom usando controles de toque para cortar certos objetos na tela.

jogo.dica1: I was going to give you a hint, but I took an arrow to the knee.
jogo.dica2: The Dragonborn says: "FUS-RO-DAH!"
jogo.dica1br: Eu iria lhe dar uma dica, mas eu levei uma flechada no joelho.
jogo.dica2br: O Dragonborn diz: "FUS-ROH-DAH!"

jogo.dica1: This is a platformer game developed by Activision released for the Atari 2600 in 1982. It is the second best-selling game made for the Atari 2600 (after Pac-Man), with over 4 million copies sold.
jogo.dica2: Be careful to not fall on the pit!
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de plataforma criado pela Activision e lançado para Atari 2600 em 1982. Este é o segundo jogo mais vendido nesta plataforma (depois de Pac-Man), com mais de 4 milhões de unidades vendidas.
jogo.dica2br: Cuidado para não cair nos abismos! Tome cuidado com crocodilos e escorpiões. Balance por cima dos crocodilos e dos abismos se segurando em cipós.

jogo.dica1: This is an adventure game released for the Playstation 3 in 2012. It is known for featuring beautiful graphics and music and won several Game of the Year awards.
jogo.dica2: In this game you are teamed up with random online strangers to go on an epic journey. The only comunication between you and your companion is made by using musical chimes.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de aventura lançado para Playstation 3 em 2012. Ele é conhecido por ter lindos gráficos e música, além de ter ganho prêmios de melhor jogo do ano em diversas categorias.
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo você se pode se aliar com jogadores desconhecidos aleatoreamente online e com eles fazer sua jornada. A única comunicação possível com eles é o uso de tons musicais.

jogo.dica1: This tower-defense game was made by PopCap and released in 2009 for PC.
jogo.dica2: Protect your house from a zombie invasion using your lawn as your battlefield. A character named Crazy Dave will help you with new power-ups.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo estilo tower-defense criado pela PopCap que foi lançado em 2009 para PC.
jogo.dica2br: Proteja sua casa de uma invasão zumbi usando seu jardim como campo de batalha. Um personagem chamado Crazy Dave lhe ajudara com novos power-ups.

jogo.dica1: This game was released on 1996 for the Game Boy.
jogo.dica2: Capture monsters into mechanic balls and train them into battle against other creatures.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado em 1996 para Game Boy.
jogo.dica2br: Capture monstros em bolas mecânicas e treine-os para batalhar com outras criaturas.

jogo.dica1: This game was released on 1985 for NES.
jogo.dica2: This game revolves around bombs. Use the explosives to destroy barriers, gather power-ups and defeat enemies.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo foi lançado em 1985 para NES.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo gira em torno do uso de bombas. Use-as para explodir barreiras, coletar poderes e derrotar inimigos.

jogo.dica1: This RPG was released for the Playstation on 1998. It was the first game on its game series to have a new feature called "Junction System" which was based on summoning monsters called Guardian Forces or GF.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is named Squall Leonheart.
jogo.dica1br: Este RPG foi lançado para Playstation em 1998. Este foi o primeiro jogo de sua série a apresentar "Junction System", que envolve invocar monstros chamados "Guardian Forces", ou GF.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo se chama Squall Leonheart.

jogo.dica1: Slash through waves of enemies with your katana-like Dragon Sword in this game, which is considered one of the hardest NES games of all time. Also, this was one of the first games to use cutscenes to tell a story.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is named Ryu Hayabusa.
jogo.dica1br: Enfrente hordas de inimigos com sua espada Dragon Sword. Este jogo é considerado um dos mais difíceis já lançados para NES. Este também foi um dos primeiros jogos que usou cenas cinematográficas para contar a história.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo se chama Ryu Hayabusa.

jogo.dica1: This is an 1992 platformer game released for SNES and Sega Genesis that is based on a movie.
jogo.dica2: This game`s main character is Gomez and his objective is to save the members of his family including Morticia, Pugsley, Wednesday and the wacky Uncle Fester.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de plataforma lançado para SNES em Mega Drive em 1992. Este jogo é baseado em um filme.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo é Gomez, e seu objetivo é salvar os membros de sua família, como Mortícia, Feioso, Vandinha e o despojado Tio Chico.

jogo.dica2: >>(Baphomet)
jogo.dica1br: Um MMORPG muito famoso lançado pela Gravity em 2002. Marcou gerações.
jogo.dica2br: Poring, Poporing, Bafomé e Peco Peco são alguns monstros encontrados nesse jogo.

jogo.dica1: This Super Nintendo game is played with a special mouse.
jogo.dica2: Play various mini-games such as music-making, painting, fly-killing and animation.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo de Super Nintendo é jogado com um controle especial de mouse.
jogo.dica2br: Jogue vários mini-games como criação de música, pintura, o mata-moscas e animação

jogo.dica1: Players control a spaceship most of the time. Sometimes it's possible to ride a tank and a submarine too.
jogo.dica2: A fox, a falcon, a hare and a toad join forces to slay the menace of an evil ape by using spaceships.
jogo.dica1br: O jogador controla uma espaçonave a maior parte do tempo. Em algumas ocasiões, também é possível controlar um tanque e um submarino.
jogo.dica2br: Uma raposa, um falcão, um coelho e um sapo unem forças para eliminar a ameaça espacial de um primata maligno usando suas naves.

jogo.dica1: This game's main character is known as the Blue Bomber.
jogo.dica2: Face against six robot masters and copy their power to face against the evil Dr. Wily.
jogo.dica1br: O protagonista deste jogo é conhecido como "Blue Bomber" (Bombardeiro Azul).
jogo.dica2br: Enfrente seis mestres robôs e copie seus poderes para então enfrentar o maligno Doutor Wily.

jogo.dica1: This action third-person game series is developed by Naughty Dog Studios exclusively for the Playstation consoles.
jogo.dica2: The game follows treasure-hunter Nathan Drake as he travels around the world to uncover various historical mysteries.
jogo.dica1br: Esta série de jogos de ação em terceira pessoa é desenvolvida pela Naughty Dog Studios exclusivamente para os consoles Playstation.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo é sobre um caçador de tesouros chamado Nathan Drake que viaja pelo mundo para descobrir vários mistérios históricos.

jogo.dica1: This is a tile-matching puzzle game developed by PopCap games and first released for the web in 2001.
jogo.dica2: This game's original title was Diamond Mines, because the player matches up 3 jewels of the same color.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de quebra-cabeça desenvolvido pela PopCap games lançado originalmente em 2001 para web.
jogo.dica2br: O nome original deste jogo era Diamond Mines (Minas de Diamante), pois nele o jogador precisa alinhar 3 jóias de uma mesma cor.

jogo.dica1: This game was sold along the Nintendo Wii system on the Americas.
jogo.dica2: Use motion control to play tennis, boxing, golf, bowling and baseball.
jogo.dica1br: No continente americano, este jogo foi vendido juntamente com o Wii.
jogo.dica2br: Use controles de movimento para jogar tênis, boxe, golfe, boliche e baseball.

jogo.dica1: This is the second installment of a racing game which features various power-ups.
jogo.dica2: This game introduced four-player local multiplayer to the Mario Kart series.
jogo.dica1br: Este é o segundo jogo de uma série de corrida que apresenta vários itens e poderes para se usar enquanto se dirige.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo introduziu o multiplayer local para até 4 pessoas na série Mario Kart.

jogo.plataforma: PC / Xbox360 / PS2 / PS3 / PSP / NDS / Wii
jogo.dica1: This game has building blocks... of JUSTICE!
jogo.dica2: This is a game of the Lego series featuring one of the most famous DC superheroes.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo tem blocos montáveis... de JUSTIÇA!
jogo.dica2br: Esteé um jogo da série Lego sobre um dos mais famosos super-heróis da DC.

jogo.nome: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell (the first one)
jogo.dica1: This game's protagonist is named Sam Fisher.
jogo.dica2: The first game of this stealth game series has a novel tie-in written by American author Tom Clancy.
jogo.dica1br: O protagonista deste jogo se chama Sam Fisher.
jogo.dica2br: O primeiro jogo desta série baseada em furtividade é complementada por um romance criado por um escritor norte-americano chamado Tom Clancy.

jogo.dica1: When there`s something strange in the neighborhood. Who you gonna call?
jogo.dica2: Prepare to use your Proton Packs and Ghost Traps in this 2009 videogame based on a famous movie from the 80s. But remember, never cross the streams!
jogo.dica1br: "Quando há algo errado na vizinhança... Quem você vai chamar?" Este é um jogo de tiro em terceira pessoa lançado para diversas plataformas em 2009.
jogo.dica2br: Se prepare para usar seus Proton Packs e armadilhas de fantasma neste jogo baseado em um filme famoso da década de 80. Mas lembre-se, nunca cruze os raios de próton!

jogo.dica1: This is a Super Nintendo game based on a Disney animation with a story that happens in the desert.
jogo.dica2: This platform game tells the story of a hero whose friends are a monkey, a magic carpet and a blue genie.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de Super Nintendo baseado em uma animação da Disney ambientada em um deserto.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo de plataforma conta a história de um herói cujos amigos são um macaco, um tapete mágico e um gênio azul.

jogo.dica1: The cake is a lie.
jogo.dica2: In this puzzle first-person game, you have to navigate a laboratory named Aperture Science and pass through several tests. Trying to escape, you'll encounter GLaDos, the main computer of the facility, and the companion cube, your trusty friend.
jogo.dica1br: "The cake is a lie." (O bolo é uma mentira).
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo de quebra-cabeças em primeira pessoa, o objetivo é escapar de um laboratório chamado Aperture Science e passar por vários testes. Durante o jogo, você encontrará GLaDos, o computador do local e o companion cube, seu amigo confiável.

jogo.dica1: Although this game features Nintendo characters, it was developed by Rare, when it still worked with Nintendo.
jogo.dica2: In this game series, a group of monkeys must face against evil crocodiles named the Kremlings.
jogo.dica1br: Apesar deste jogo apresentar personagens da Nintendo, ele foi desenvolvido pela Rare, quando ela ainda trabalhava com a Nintendo.
jogo.dica2br: Nesta série de jogos, um grupo de macacos deve enfrentar um maligno grupo de crocodilos chamados Kremlings.

jogo.dica1: This is an Arcade platformer game made by Nintendo and released in 1983.
jogo.dica2: This was the first appearence of the brother of the world's most famous pumber.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de plataforma para Arcades feito pela Nintendo e lançado em 1983.
jogo.dica2br: Esta foi a primeira aparição do irmão do encanador mais famoso do mundo.

jogo.dica1: This game is tipically played with a dance pad containing four diagonal arrows and a center panel.
jogo.dica2: This rhythm dance Arcade game name is commonly abbreviated to PIU.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo normalmente é jogado com um dance pad contendo quatro setas diagonais e um painel central.
jogo.dica2br: O nome deste jogo de ritmo para Arcades é geralmente abreviado para PIU.

jogo.dica1: This game's main character is named Faith.
jogo.dica2: This game is a first-person platformer that is heavily based on parkour. The character must always follow the path marked by the highlighted red objects.
jogo.dica1br: O nome da personagem principal deste jogo é Faith.
jogo.dica2br: Este é um jogo de plataforma em primeira pessoa que é baseado fortemente em parkour. A personagem deve sempre seguir o caminho que for marcado por objetos vermelhos.

jogo.dica1: One of this Atari arcade game's features is the hyperspace button. When pressed, the ship teleports to a random location on the screen. That is a very risky move because it could mean a leap to safety or certain death.
jogo.dica2: This game's name is the same of an object that appears on the screen.
jogo.dica1br: Uma das funcionalidades deste jogo de Atari para Arcades é o botão de hyperspace. Quando pressionado, faz a nave se teletransportar para um ponto aleatório da tela. Este é um movimento arriscado.
jogo.dica2br: O nome deste jogo é o mesmo de um objeto que aparece na tela.

jogo.dica1: This is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game first released in 2008 for the Xbox 360. It also incorporates a few fantasy role-playing video game elements such as weapon customization, experience points and magical abilities.
jogo.dica2: Four knights must go on a quest to save princesses, recover an ancient jewel, crash castles and defeat an evil wizard.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo beat'em up em side-scrolling lançado em 2008 para Xbox 360. Ele incorpora alguns elementos de RPGs de fantasia como customisação de armas, pontos de experiência e magias.
jogo.dica2br: Quatro cavaleiros devem se aventurar para salvar princesas, recuperar uma jóia antiga, quebrar castelos e vencer um feiticeiro maligno.

jogo.dica1br: Um dos FPS mais jogados, trouxe uma extensa variedade de veículos em sua jogabilidade.
jogo.dica2br: Tendo como principal tema as guerras, já lançou jogos sobre a segunda guerra mundial e até uma futurista.

jogo.dica1: This PS1 videogame is based on a popular cardgame.
jogo.dica2: This game is also known as Forbidden Memories.

jogo.dica1: This is a very famous Arcade game made by Konami and released in 1981.
jogo.dica2: This game's name is very similar to the name of the animal that the player controls.

jogo.dica1: This is a historical real-time strategy game series first released for the PC on 1997. The first game focused on Europe, Asia and Africa, spanning from the Stone Age to the Iron Age.
jogo.dica2: This real-time strategy game is known for having a priest unit that chants "Wololo" and converts enemy units to friendly.

jogo.dica1: This game is a puzzle game developed by Nintendo and released for NES and Game Boy on 1990. The game allows the player to choose the background music of the game between two options: Fever and Chill.
jogo.dica2: This this game, the world's most famous plumber must drop capsules on viruses to eliminate them.

jogo.dica1: This is a first-person shooter released in 2004 for PC. It features a unique weapon named the Gravity Gun.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is named Gordon Freeman.

jogo.dica1: This is the first NES game to feature an internal battery that allowed the game to be saved.
jogo.dica2: The hero of this game must explore the world and collect many different items such as Keys, Bombs, Arrows, Candles, a Magic Wand and a Boomerang.

jogo.dica1: This is the first Mario game that introduced the characters Rosalina and Luma.
jogo.dica2: Mario is taken out of the Mushroom Kingdom and straight onto space. He must explore the galaxy in order to find the princess.

jogo.dica1: This game's motorcycles use Turbo to go faster. If this boost used too much, the motorcycle overheats and stops running.
jogo.dica2: This is an exciting motocross racing videogame made by Nintendo and released for the NES on 1984. It featured a Design Mode which allowed the players to create their own racing tracks.

jogo.dica1: This game was made by Konami and released for the NES on 1986. The main objective is to defeat Dracula.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is named Simon Belmont.

jogo.dica1: The bomb has been planted! .. "Fire in the hole!!" .. "Roger that."
jogo.dica1br: "The bomb has been planted!" .. "Fire in the hole!!" .. "Roger that."
jogo.dica2br: Um dos jogos de tiro mais famosos do mundo. Sua mecânica se baseia na disputa entre terroristas e contra-terroristas.

jogo.nome: Brain Age: Train Your Brain in Minutes a Day!
jogo.dica1: This Nintendo game is a collection of mathematical and logical puzzles released for the Nintendo DS on 2005. It is based on the work of neurocientist Dr. Ryuta Kawashima, who is the main character of the game.
jogo.dica2: The objective of this game is to train your brain in minutes a day.

jogo.dica1: In North America, this NES game was released featuring Mike Tyson as the final opponent.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is named Little Mac and his coach is named Doc.

jogo.dica1: There are five different levels in this NES game: The African Mines, The Amazon, The Himalayas, Transylvania and The Moon.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is Disney character Scrooge McDuck.

jogo.dica1: This is a Mobile endless-runner game released on 2011. The main character of the game is called Guy Dangerous.
jogo.dica2: The game's protagonist is an explorer who, having stolen an idol from a temple, is chased by demonic monkeys.

jogo.dica1: This is an indie survival-horror game released for PC in 2010. It features a protagonist named Daniel exploring a dark castle.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character woke up in a castle without remembering anything about his past. Now, to keep his sanity, he must light up te scenery by using his oil lantern or using tinderboxes to light up candles.

jogo.dica1: This game features many different minigames based on aerobics, balance exercises and yoga. It keeps track of your weight.
jogo.dica2: This game came bundled with a unique peripheral named Wii Balance Board.

jogo.dica1: This run-and-gun game was made by SDK and released in 1996 for arcades. It is widely known for its sense of humor, fluid hand-drawn animation, and fast paced two-player action.
jogo.dica2: The most recognized features of this side scrolling shooting game are the ability to control tanks in certain stages and saving prisoners to earn power-ups.

jogo.dica1: This is a tower defense game released for web on 2007. It was very sucessful and has many sequels and ports to mobile, PSP and Nintendo DSi.
jogo.dica2: The goal of the game is to avoid baloons (named "bloons") for reaching the end of the stage by placing towers in its path. One of the towers is a monkey shooting darts.

jogo.dica1: This game is a compilation of minigames involving cooking. The first of the series was released on 2006 for the Nintendo DS.
jogo.dica2: It you're bad at cooking, don't worry. Mama will fix it.

jogo.dica1: This is a life simulation game series created by Will Wright and first released for PC on 2000. It is the best selling PC game franchise in history.
jogo.dica2: In this sandbox-style game, the player creates virtual people and places them in houses, trying to manage their lives. The game's currency is named Simoleon.

jogo.dica1: Help Maxwell in his quest to solve puzzles and collect Starites.
jogo.dica2: The most unique feature of this game is that every time the main character writes a name of an object in a magic notebook, the object appears.

jogo.dica1: "Objection!"
jogo.dica2: Play as an ace attourney, investigate felonies and use the evidence on court to find out who the culprit is.

jogo.dica1: This is a first-person shooter video game released for Xbox 360, Playstation3 and PC on 2009. It is known for featuring character building elements typical to RPGs.
jogo.dica2: The player must choose between four characters: Roland, the Soldier, Mordecai, the Hunter, Lilith, the Siren, and Brick (a Berserker). Then the player must explore the planet of Pandora in search of a legendary Vault, with the help of robots named Claptrap.

jogo.dica1: >>(Force Blader and Force Shielder)
jogo.dica2: >>"XXXXX XXXXXX:The Revolution of Action!"
jogo.dica1br: MMORPG lançado em 2005 pela empresa sul coreana ESTSoft, algumas das classes desse jogo são espadachim e guardião arcano.
jogo.dica2br: "XXXXX XXXXXX: A revolução da ação!" Trouxe como novidade um sistema de combos para as batalhas.

jogo.dica1: This is a Xbox-exclusive series of third-person shooter games. The first game was released in 2006.
jogo.dica2: Join Marcus Fenix in his quest to defeat the alien forces of the Locusts.
jogo.dica1br: Esta é uma série de jogos de tiro em terceira pessoa exclusiva de Xbox. Seu primeiro jogo foi lançado em 2006.
jogo.dica2br: Junte-se a Marcus Fenix em sua busca para destruir as forças alienígenas dos Locusts.

jogo.dica1: This is a strategy and resource management game series first released for the Nintendo Gamecube on 2001. It was designed by Shigeru Miyamoto, the creator of Mario.
jogo.dica2: The player must control a horde of little plant-animal hybrids of different colors. There are Red ones (resistant to fire), Yellow ones, Blue ones (that don't drown in water) and others.

jogo.dica1: This game was voted best iPhone game of the year in 2011 and has sold at least 6.5 million copies based on Apple's Game Center statistics.
jogo.dica2: The player takes control of a bird whose wings are too small to fly. The goal of the game is to use hills in order to gain speed and flutter as long as possible.

jogo.dica1: This is a Capcom survival-horror game first released for the Gamecube and the PS2 on 2005. This game was the first of the franchise to change the gameplay to a trhird-person shooter.
jogo.dica2: Join Leon Kennedy in his quest to save Ashley, the president's daughter, and fight against hordes of villagers infected with a parasite named "Las Plagas".

jogo.dica1: This is a Nintendo platformer game released for the SNES on 1990. It was the first appearence of Yoshi, the green dinosaur sidekick.
jogo.dica2: Mario and Luigi must save Dinosaur Land from Bowser and his minions: the Koopalings.

jogo.dica1: This is an indie puzzle videogame first released for Wii and PC on 2008. There are signs throughout the game that give hints and funny remarks that were written by the mysterious Sign Painter.
jogo.dica2: This game revolves around building structures with balls of goo.

jogo.dica1: This is a famous post-apocalyptic action RPG game released for PC, Xbox 360 and Playstation 3 on 2008. It was developed by Bethesda Game Studios.
jogo.dica2: This game is known for featuring a unique combat system using the V.A.T.S. (Vault-Tec Assisted Targeting System). The combat is a hybrid of turn-based and real-time and each limb of the fighters has a different health bar and a different hit percentage.

jogo.dica1: This is a Mobile game released on 2013 and made popular on the internet for being a "rage game". It was developed by a Vietnamese named Dong Nyugem.
jogo.dica2: The player controls a bird flying between rows of pipes.

jogo.dica1: This is a very famous Atari game released for Arcades on 1976. A prototype of this game was made by Steve Wozniak with help from Steve Jobs.
jogo.dica2: The player controls a paddle that hits a ball in order to break bricks on top of the screen.

jogo.dica1: This game is an unique third-person shooter RPG series that was first released on 2007 for Xbox 360, PS3 and PC. This series is known for giving the player multiple choices that have different consequences in the game story.
jogo.dica2: Help Commander Shepard fight a race of mechanichal beings known as Reapers.

jogo.nome: The Legend of Zelda - Majora's Mask
jogo.dica1: This is the second installment of this series for the Nintendo 64. It was released on 2000.
jogo.dica2: You have 3 days to stop the moon from falling on Earth and destroying everything. Wearing masks and playing music are important means to solve puzzles.
jogo.dica1br: Este é o segundo jogo desta série lançado para Nintendo 64. Ele foi lançado em 2000.
jogo.dica2br: O jogador tem 3 dias para impedir que a Lua caia na Terra e destrua tudo. Usar máscaras e tocar música são meios importantes de resolver quebra-cabeças.

jogo.dica1: This is a RPG first released on SNES on 1991. This was the first game of the series that introduced the Active Time Battle (ATB) system, in which the player must give orders to the characters in real-time.
jogo.dica2: Even though this is the fourth installment of this famous RPG series, it was named in North America as if it was the second game.

jogo.plataforma: PS2, GameCube, XBox, PSP, Nintendo DS, X360, PS3, PC
jogo.dica1: This is a high-speed racing game series first released on 2001 for PS2, Xbox and Gamecube. It is known for an emphasis on agressive driving.
jogo.dica2: The most notable feature that the series is known for is its crash modes. In-race rewards are given to a player if they take risks such as driving towards oncoming traffic or deliberately attempting to make their opponents crash.

jogo.dica1: This rhythm game features songs like Octopus's Garden, Revolution and I am the Walrus.
jogo.dica2: This game has 4 different roles (guitar, bass, drums and vocals) and features a very famous British rock band from Liverpool.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo de ritmo apresenta várias músicas, como por exemplo Octopus's Garden, Revolution e I am the Walrus.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo tem quatro opções de papel a se cumprir: guitarrista, baixista, baterista e cantor, além de apresentar uma famosa banda britânica de rock de Liverpool.

jogo.dica1: This puzzle game was first created in Russia and then released for the Game Boy in 1984.
jogo.dica2: There are seven different game pieces (named Tetriminos) that fall from the top of the screen and the player must arrange them so that they form a line. Each time a line is completed it disappears and the player earns points.

jogo.dica1: This is an arcade puzzle/platformer videogame first released on 1982. Its main character made a cameo in the Disney movie Wreck-It Ralph.
jogo.dica2: The game takes place on an isometric pyramid of cubes. The main character starts at the top of the pyramid and jumps diagonally to adjacent cubes. The goal of the game is to turn all cubes into the same color, while escpaing enemies.

jogo.dica1: This game features many special enemies with different habilities such as the Boomer, the Hunter, the Smoker, the Charger, the Tank and the feared Witch
jogo.dica2: In this Valve game, released for Steam, a group of four survivors , named Francis, Bill, Zoey and Louis, must work together to survive hordes of Infected enemies and escape to safety.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo tem vários inimigos especiais com diferentes habilidades como o Boomer, o Hunter, o Smoker, o Charger, o Tank e a temida Witch.
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo feito pela Valve, e lançado na Steam, um grupo de quatro sobreviventes, chamados Francis, Bill, Zoey e Louis, precisam trabalhar juntos para sobreviver a uma horda de inimigos infectados para escapar para um lugar seguro.

jogo.nome: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse
jogo.dica1: This is a platformer game made by Sega and released to the Sega Genesis on 1990. The main enemy is a witch called Mizrabel.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is Mickey Mouse.

jogo.dica1: This is a beat'em up game released on 1987 for arcades and the NES platform.
jogo.dica2: Up to two players can play as martial artists, named Billy and Jimmy, to confront street bandits as they progress through diversified scenarios.

jogo.dica1: This game is an RPG released for Dreamcast on 2000. A port was later released for Gamecube on 2002. This game's main character appears as a playable character in the game Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed.
jogo.dica2: The game's story focuses around Vyse, a young pirate in a Jules Verne-inspired fantasy world, and his friends as they attempt to stop the Valuan Empire from reviving ancient weapons with the potential to destroy the world. This game is known for having flying pirate ships .

jogo.dica1: This is a platformer-puzzle game first released as an exclusive for the Xbox Live Arcade on 2010. Later, ports were made to Playstation 3 and PC. It is a game known for its dark aesthetics that resemble a film noir or the German Expressionism.
jogo.dica2: The player takes control of a nameless boy that must save his sister from the "edge of hell". Some of this game's most famous hazards are glowing worms, bear traps and a giant spider.

jogo.dica1: This is Playstation 3 exclusive game is a survival-horror released on 2013. It was developed by Naugthy Dog, same developers of the Uncharted series.
jogo.dica2: This game's main characters are Joel and Ellie that are trying to escape from zombie-like creatures that were infected by a mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus.

jogo.dica1: This game's main character is a prince on a quest to rebuild the galaxy that was accidentally destroyed by his father, The King of All Cosmos.
jogo.dica2: This game features an unique gameplay mechanic in which the player must roll around an adhesive ball to collect a bunch of objects in each level. The bigger the ball, the bigger are the objects that the player is able to collect.

jogo.dica1: This is a SNES platformer-shooter game first released on 1992. The game is mostly side-scrolling action but some stages feature different challenges such as driving a landspeeder or piloting a X-Wing.
jogo.dica2: This game features three different playable characters named Luke, Han and Chewbacca.

jogo.dica1: Avoid the ghosts while they chase you in a labirynth.
jogo.dica2: Eat pellets to win. Eat a special pellet to be unbeatable for a short time and eat your enemies. Waka, waka, waka...
jogo.dica1br: Evite os fantasmas que te perseguem em um labirinto.
jogo.dica2br: Coma pastilhas para vencer. Comer uma pastilha especial lhe deixa temporariamente invencível de modo que você pode comer seus inimigos. Waka, waka, waka...

jogo.dica1: This is a stealth-action game first released for the Playstation on 1998. It takes place on an alaskan island named Shadow Moses.
jogo.dica2: The main character of this game has a Codec radio in his head and many different characters call him to help with hints and backstory. Some of these characters include Meryl Silverburgh, Colonel Campbell, Mei Ling and Dr. Hal "Otacon" Emmerich.

jogo.dica1: This is an indie platform game released for PC on 2013. It features many roguelike elements.
jogo.dica2: The most unique feature of this game is that when a character dies, he is replaced with a randomly generated heir with his own unique abilities and characteristics. For example, a character can have genetic peculiarities such as being colorblind, have ADHD or having dwarfism.

jogo.dica1: This is a beat'em up game released on 1989 for the arcades.
jogo.dica2: The most famous characters of this action game are Haggar, Cody and Guy.

jogo.dica1: This is a Mobile freemium strategy game released on 2012. Purchasing gems via credit card helps players advance faster in the game.
jogo.dica2: This is a multiplayer game that allows players to build their community, train troops, and attack other players to earn gold and elixir while building their own defenses to protect against attackers. Players can also use the chat feature to communicate with others and join clans to aid each other.

jogo.dica1: This is a role-playing hack-and-slash game series that is developed by Blizzard. The first game was released on 1997 for PC and had three character classes: the warrior, the rogue, and the sorcerer.
jogo.dica2: This game takes place in the world of Sanctuary, as well as Hell and Heaven. The final enemy of this game is the devil.

jogo.dica1: This is a plaform game released on 1986 for arcades. The main characters are two dragons named Bub and Bob.
jogo.dica2: This game revolves around trapping enemies in bubbles and them popping them.

jogo.dica1: This is a Capcom hack-and-slash game series. The first game was released on 2001 for the PS2 and was originally going to be a sequel to the Resident Evil series.
jogo.dica2: Some of this series' most famous characters are Dante, Trish and Vergil.

jogo.dica1: This game's protagonist thought he had won a mansion in a contest, but he actually had lost his brother to a ghostly being.
jogo.dica2: This is the first game starring the younger brother of the most famous videogame character of all time.

jogo.dica1: This game was originally a completely different game named Doki Doki Panic.
jogo.dica2: Some of this game's enemies are Mousers, Phantos, Ninjis, Birdos and Bob-ombs.

jogo.nome: Darkstalkers : The Night Warriors/ Vampire: The Night Warriors
jogo.dica1: This is a vampire-themed fighting game that debuted on the Playstation system on 1994.
jogo.dica2: This game is most well-known for the character in the picture, the succubus Morrigan.

jogo.dica1: One of this game's characters is a black haired girl named Tifa Lockhart
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is named Cloud Strife.

jogo.dica1: This game is famous for coming bundled with the Windows operating system.
jogo.dica2: This is a logic game in which every number you find shows how many mines are hidden next to the number's square. The goal is to unveil all possible squares without finding any mines.

jogo.dica1: This is a physics-based puzzle game released for PC and Mobiles on 2009. It features a level editor that enable players to share and download custom content.
jogo.dica2: The goal of this game is to guide a ball through the level by drawing physical objects on the screen with a crayon.

jogo.dica1: This is an Arcade shooting game made by Atari on 1980. It was later ported to the Atari consoles. It is considered one of the most notable games from the Golden Age of Video Arcade Games.
jogo.dica2: The player takes control of an anti-missile command that must defend the city. Controlling a crosshair, the player must estimate the trajectory of the missiles to fire counter attacks.

jogo.dica1: This is a Capcom platformer-shooter game released for the SNES on 1993. The story of the game takes places on the year 21XX.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist, named "X", must fight against an evil force of robots, named Mavericks, that want to destroy mankind.

jogo.dica1: This is a platform parody game released for the Web on 2008. It was published by Armor Games.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is a blue elephant in a quest to find all 100 achievements on the game.

jogo.dica1: The main goal of this Sega Genesis platformer game is to rescue several little children.
jogo.dica2: This game's name is based on a famous dance move made popular by Michael Jackson.

jogo.dica1: This is a platformer released for Super Nintendo. Throwing eggs is one important way of interacting with the enemies and the world of this game.
jogo.dica2: This game's heroes are dinossaurs who once appeared as sideckicks to a famous Nintendo character. They must protect him in his baby form, or else they will fail in their quest.

jogo.dica1: This is a famous first-person shooter game released for PC on 1993. It was considered a very controversial game at the time for its high levels of graphic violence.
jogo.dica2: After a portal to Hell was opened between two moons of Mars, a space marine must fight his way through hordes of demons.

jogo.dica1: This is the first 3D game starring this pink, round hero.
jogo.dica2: Not only you can copy your enemies abilities by absorbing them, you can also combine two absorbed abilities in order to form a new one.

jogo.dica1: This is a laserdisc game made by Don Bluth Studios for arcade on 1984. It was released four months after another laserdisc game made by the same company named Dragon's Lair.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is Ace who must save his girlfriend, Kimberly, from the evil Commander Borf.

jogo.dica1: This is a basketball game developed by Midway and released for Arcades on 1993. It was later ported to home consoles. It is known for featuring fast gameplay and exagerated realism.
jogo.dica2: This basketball game features official NBA teams such as the Chicago Bulls and the Orlando Magic.

jogo.dica1: This is a very famous racing game series published by Eletronic Arts. It is the most successful racing franchise of the world having sold more than 150 million units.
jogo.dica2: Most of the games in this racing franchise feature car customization and police pursuits in races. Some of the installments in this series are named Underground, Most Wanted and Carbon.

jogo.dica1: This is a Facebook game created by Zynga and released on 2008.
jogo.dica2: Play as a gangster and build your own mafia. You can challenge your friends' mafia to a fight or simply ask them for help to deal with difficult missions.

jogo.nome: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: The Game
jogo.dica1: This beat 'em up game is based on a series of nerdy comic books written by Bryan Lee O'Malley.
jogo.dica2: Some of this game's playable characters are Ramona Flowers, Kim Pine, Stephen Stills and Knives Chau.

jogo.dica1: This is one of the most famous first-person shooters released for the Nintendo 64 system. It was developed by Rareware, and released on 2000.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is named Joanna Dark.

jogo.dica1: This is an online endless-runner game released in the Adult Swim website. It has a very catchy backround music named Always.
jogo.dica2: Press Z to dash in this game featuring a robotic mythical beast.

jogo.nome: The Legend of Zelda - Twilight Princess
jogo.dica1: This is the first installment of it's franchise on which is possible to fight with a sword while mounted on a horse.
jogo.dica2: Play both as an human and as a wolf in an adventure to save the kingdom and it's decayed princess.

jogo.dica1: This simulator-like game is known for allowing the player to choose between various villagers to marry with and have children.
jogo.dica2: Raise animals, participate on horseback races, plant crops and upgrade your tools to enhance your farm.

jogo.dica1: This is a puzzle-game released for the Dreamcast in 1999. It was was the first popular game with online mode support for any major video game console.
jogo.dica2: The goal in this puzzle game is to arrange arrows in the floor to direct a bunch of mice to a rocket. But beware the cats!

jogo.dica1br: Antigamente era apenas um "mapa" de warcraft.
jogo.dica2br: Desenvolvido pela Valve para Steam, XXXX X é a continuação de um clássico RTS.

jogo.dica1: This is a platform game released for Playstation on 1998. This game's protagonist makes cameos in other Sony games such as Hot Shots Golf 2 and Playstation All-Stars Battle Royale.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is Sir Daniel Fortesque, a skeletal knight brought back to life by the dark magic of an evil scorcerer named Zarok.

jogo.dica1: Some of this game's protagonist partners are named: Goombario, Bow, Watt and Sushie.
jogo.dica2: This RPG's world is 3D, but it's characters are depicted in 2D.

jogo.dica1: This game was released on 1988 for NES.
jogo.dica2: This game introduced the tanooki power-up to it's famous hero's arsenal.

jogo.dica1: This is a simulation game released for PC on 1994 and later ported to SNES, Sega Saturn and Playstation. It was designed by Will Wright.
jogo.dica2: This is the second installment of the most famous city-building simulator franchise.

jogo.nome: Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly/ Project Zero 2: Crimson Butterfly
jogo.dica1: This survival-horror game series' name in Japan is Project Zero.
jogo.dica2: In this game series, you must defend yourself against ghosts by taking pictures of them with the Camera Obscura.

jogo.dica1: This is a racing game released for SNES on 1992. It is known for its catchy soundtrack.
jogo.dica2: The player can choose beteween four different cars: the Cannibal, a red and faster car; the Sidewinder, a white and more fuel-efficient car; the Razor, a purple and well-rounded car; and the Weasel, a blue car with better acceleration and handling.

jogo.dica1br: Jogo de simulação lançado em 2008 pela EA para PC.
jogo.dica2br: De uma célula até o universo.

jogo.dica1: This is a real-time strategy game first released for PC on 2002. An expansion for this game named The Titans was released on 2003.
jogo.dica2: This game series is a spin-off of Age of Empires that takes inspiration on myths and legends of the Greek, Egyptian and Norse mythologies.

jogo.dica1: This is a role-playing game released for the Playstation 2 on 2001. It features a fictional sport named blitzball.
jogo.dica2: Some of this game's most famous characters are named Tidus, Yuna, Auron, Lulu and Rikku.

jogo.dica1: This is an action role-playing game first released for Playstation 3 and Xbox 360 on 2011. It is a game known for being relentlessly difficult.
jogo.dica2: This game has unique online features. Players can touch blood stains on the ground to see how other players died in a occasion or read messages left by other players on the game world that can give hints or warnings.

jogo.dica1: This is a platformer game released on 1985. It was a launch title for the NES in North America.
jogo.dica2: Nana and Popo are two eskimos trying to recover stolen vegetables from a giant condor.

jogo.dica1: This game franchise was first released for PC on 2000 and its sequels were released for all major consoles. It features a combination of action and stealth.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is Agent 47, a cloned assassin-for-hire.

jogo.dica1: This is an adventure game first released on 2006 for the Playstation 2. It is known for its art style that is heavily inspired in Japanese ink ilustration (known as sumi-e).
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is the Japanese sun goddess, Amaterasu, in wolf form.

jogo.dica1: This is a quiz game released for NES on 1987.
jogo.dica2: This game is a version of a famous American TV game-show that is known for all answers having to be told in form of a question.

jogo.dica1: This is a very famous Facebook puzzle game made by King and released in 2012.
jogo.dica2: This is a sweet delicious match-three puzzle game. At the end of each level there's always a Sugar Crush.

jogo.dica1: This is a real-time strategy game series first released on PC on 1995. The first game of the series is widely considered as the title which originally defined and popularized the real-time strategy genre.
jogo.dica2: The first game of this series portrays a war between two globalized factions: the Global Defense Initiative (GDI) and the Brotherhood of Nod, led by the mysterious Kane. The groups compete for control of Tiberium, a mysterious substance that slowly spreads across the world.

jogo.dica1: In this Nintendo Wii action game, released in 2007, the player must charge the batteries of his sword by making an up-and-down motion with the Wii Remote
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist, Travis Touchdown, buys a beam katana on the internet and decides to become the number one hitman in the United Assassins Association.

jogo.dica1: This is a PSP game that was released on 2007 and combines elements of a rhythm game and a god game.
jogo.dica2: The player must control an army of tiny tribal creatures by beating drums in sync with the music. There are four drums (Pon, Chaka, Pata, Don) and each drum trasnlates into a different action that the army will take.

jogo.dica1: This is the first major 3D game featuring of of the biggest Capcom characters. It was first released on 1997 for the Playstation.
jogo.dica2: This game series is known as Rockman DASH in Japan. Some of its characters are Roll Caskett and Tron Bonne.

jogo.dica1: This game's main character was considered the unofficial Sega mascot before Sonic the Hedgehog.
jogo.dica2: This game takes place in the Miracle World where the protagonist must save his long lost brother, Prince Egle, from a terrible tyrant named Janken, the Great. Also, to defeat bosses, the main character must win a game of jan-ken-pon (rock, paper, scissors).

jogo.dica1: This point-and-click adventure game aeries was developed by LucasArts and first released on 1990 for PCs. A remake of the first game was released on 2009.
jogo.dica2: The player takes control of Guybrush Threepwood, a young man with the desires to become a pirate. In his quest he comes across the Ghost Pirate LeChuck and the governor of the Tri-Island area, Elaine Marley.

jogo.nome: The Legend of Zelda - A Link to the Past
jogo.dica1: This is the third installment of a famous adventure series. It was released on 1991 for the SNES.
jogo.dica2: Recover the golden triangles and the princess from the clutches of the pig villain by traveling between two dimensions, the Light and the Dark world.

jogo.dica1: This is a survival-strategy game first released on 2011 for Web Browsers. Some of the buildings available in this game are Police Stations and Malls (add defense to the city), Apartments and Motels (increase population capacity), Farms (supply food ), Bars and Churches (increase population happiness).
jogo.dica2: The goal of this game is to manage resources such as territories, food and population in order to survive a zombie outbreak and rebuild the city.

jogo.dica1: This game series features a myriad of important historical figures such as Gandhi, Montezuma and Lincoln.
jogo.dica2: This is a turn-based strategy game series in which the player must become the ruler of an ancient culture and build an empire. For that to happen, the player must engage in tasks of exploration, warfare, diplomacy and scientific discovery.

jogo.dica1: This is a platform game first released for PCs on 1989. It used rotoscoped animation and is classified in a sub-genre named cinematic platformer, that features fluid, lifelike animations.
jogo.dica2: Save a princess from the evil vizier Jaffar in this game that takes place in ancient Persia.

jogo.dica1: This game's main character is named Sora.
jogo.dica2: This game is a collaboration between Square Enix and Disney Interactive Studios.

jogo.plataforma: PC / PS3 / PSVita / iPad2 / BlackBerry / Android
jogo.dica1: This is an indie point-and-click adventure game released for PCs on 2009. This game is known for having no dialogue and using a system of animated thought bubbles to communicate things to the player.
jogo.dica2: The player takes control of a robot named Josef and must solve puzzles and explore the machine city.

jogo.dica1: This a beat'em up is known as one of the hardest games released for the NES platform.
jogo.dica2: This game features antropomorphic frogs whose limbs change shapes as they battle enemies.

jogo.dica1: This was the first installment of this space-themed Nintendo franchise which featured first-person mechanics.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is a female bounty hunter who wears an orange space suit with a red helmet and has a cannon on the right arm.

jogo.nome: Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
jogo.dica1: This game features a group of female soldier enemies named The Beauty and the Beast Unit. Their members are named Screaming Mantis, Laughing Octopus, Raging Raven and Crying Wolf.
jogo.dica2: This is a stealth-action game released for the PS3 on 2008. It is the first time that the protagonist of this game series show up as an old man.

jogo.dica1: This is an Arcade rhythm game made by Sega and first released on 1999. It is known for featuring a special controller shaped like maracas.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is a maracas-playing monkey named Amigo.

jogo.dica1: This is a "simulator" parody game released on 2013 for PCs. The initial version of this game was created in a 48-hour period for the 2013 Global Game Jam.
jogo.dica2: In this game, the player must control a surgeon performing a series of different tasks. The catch is that the player only controls the hand of the surgeon, controlling his fingers, the position and the rotation of the hand separately, resulting in a humorously difficult game.

jogo.dica1: This is an open world first-person shooter game released on 2012 for PC, PS3 and Xbox 360. A stand-alone expansion named Blood Dragon was released on 2013.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is Jason Brody who must try to escape a tropical island filled with pirates and many other dangers.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa com mundo aberto lançado em 2002 para PC, PS3 e Xbox 360. Uma expansão autônoma chamada Blood Dragon foi lançada em 2013.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo é Jason Brody, que precisa escapar de uma ilha tropical cheia de piratas e muitos outros perigos.

jogo.dica1: This is a indie puzzle-platformer game first released on 2002 on Xbox Live Arcade.It was developed by Phil Fish.
jogo.dica2: This game takes place in a 2D view inside a 3D world. The player can rotate the world 90 degrees at a time, revealing four different 2D views of a 3D world.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo independente de plataforma e quebra-cabeças lançado originalmente em 2002 para Xbox Live Arcade. Ele foi desenvolvido por Phil Fish.
jogo.dica2br: O mundo deste jogo é 3D, e a visão do jogador é em 2D. O jogador pode rotacionar a câmera em 90 graus de cada vez para revelar quatro visões 2D diferentes do mesmo espaço 3D.

jogo.dica1: This game introduced cat suits to this platformer franchise.
jogo.dica2: This is the first 3D adventure on which the princess joins two famous brothers on their quest to defeat the villain.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo introduziu roupas de gato para esta franquia de jogos de plataforma.
jogo.dica2br: Esta é a primeira aventura 3D em que a princesa se une a dois irmãos famosos para vencer o vilão.

jogo.dica1: This is a Playstation exclusive platformer game series first released on 2002 for the PS2. Some of the installments of this series are named Going Commando, Up Your Arsenal and Size Matters.
jogo.dica2: This game series follows the adventures of an antropomorphic mechanic and his sentient robot friend as they travel through the universe fighting against evil forces. The series is known for the over-the top weapons and devices used by the duo of protagonists.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de plataforma exclusivo de Playstation que estreiou em 2002 no PS2. Alguns dos jogos desta série são chamados de "Going Commando", "Up Your Arsenal" e "Size Matters".
jogo.dica2br: Esta série de jogos segue a aventura de um mecânico antropomórfico e seu robô consciente enquanto enfrentam forças malignas pelo Universo. Esta série é conhecida pelas poderosíssimas armas e equipamentos usadas por eles.

jogo.dica1: This is a real-time strategy game released on 2009 for the Playstation 3. It is primarily a multiplayer game for up to 32 players.
jogo.dica2: The goal of this game is to rescue your princess from the enemy castle while avoiding the enemy team from rescuing their princess from your castle. To make the enemy's task harder, each team can feed slices of cake to the captive princess to make her heavier and harder to carry.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de estratégia em tempo real lançado em 2009 para Playstation 3. Ele é primariamente um jogo de multiplayer para até 32 jogadores.
jogo.dica2br: O objetivo deste jogo é resgatar sua princesa do castelo inimigo e evitar que seus inimigos resgatem a princesa deles. Para dificultar o trabalho dos inimigos, é possível dar bolo para as princesas aprisionadas, deixando-as mais pesadas.

jogo.dica1: "I've got balls of steel..."
jogo.dica2: Control a blond man with sunglasses on this 3D shooter and nuke the alien scum with big guns.
jogo.dica1br: "I've got balls of steel..."
jogo.dica2br: Controle um homem loiro com óculos escuros neste jogo de tiro 3D e detone os malditos aliens usando armas grandes. O protagonista deste jogo é reconhecido por suas falas de impacto contendo linguagem adulta.

jogo.dica1: This game series' name is the Italian word for "strength".
jogo.dica2: This Xbox-exculisve racing game series is known for seeking to emulate the performance and handling characteristics of a large number of real-life production, modified and racing cars.

jogo.dica1: This is a racing game developed by Rare and released on 1997 only for Nintendo 64.
jogo.dica2: This game features animal characters and three kinds of vehicles to use in different situations: a car, a plane and a hovercraft.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de corrida desenvolvido pela Rare e lançado em 1997 apenas para Nintendo 64.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo apresenta personagens animalescos e três tipos diferentes de veículo: um carro, um avião e um hovercraft.

jogo.dica1: Some of the characters in this futuristic racing game are: Samurai Goroh, Jody Summer, Black Shadow and James McCloud.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist's famous quotes include: "Show me your moves!" and "Falcon punch!"
jogo.dica1br: Alguns dos personagens deste jogo de corrida futurista são: Samurai Goroh, Jody Summer, Black Shadow e James McCloud.
jogo.dica2br: Algumas das falas mais famosas do protagonista deste jogo são: "Show me your moves!" e "Falcon Punch!"

jogo.dica1: In this Konami psychological horror series you have to listen to the noise of your radio's static to know when enemies are close.
jogo.dica2: One of the most well-known enemies from this game series are scary, deformed nurses.

jogo.dica1: This is a Konami game first released for Arcades on 1991, and later released for Super Nintendo and Mega Drive.
jogo.dica2: One of the characters of this shoot'em up is a guy named Cormano who wears a pink poncho and a sombrero.

jogo.dica1: This game was directed by the same man who directs the Super Smash Bros series. It was released on 1996 for Super Nintendo.
jogo.dica2: This is a platform game featuring a round character protagonist who can change it's abilities based on his enemies' strenghts.

jogo.dica1: This game's main character is named Garrett.
jogo.dica2: In this stealth PC game, the player has to remain in the shadows to avoid being seen so he can steal valuables.

jogo.dica1: This game is an interactive story released for Playstation 3 on 2010. The player interacts with the game by context sensitive commands and quick-time events in action sequences. Every choice and action the player makes has an impact on the outcome of the story.
jogo.dica2: Four protagonists , named Ethan Mars, Scott Shelby, Norman Jayden and Madison Paige, are involved with the mystery of the Origami Killer, a serial-killer that drowns victims in rain water.

jogo.dica1: This is a parody platformer shooter game released for the PC on 2007. It is an unfairly hard game and features levels with references to other games such as The Legend of Zelda, Mega Man and Metroid.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is "the Kid" going on a quest to become "the Guy". There are many difficult obstacles in his way including familiar bosses such as Mike Tyson, Mecha-Birdo, Dracula and Bowser.

jogo.dica1br: Jogo clássico lançado para Atari 2600 no ano de 1981. Consiste de evitar que o projétil caia.
jogo.dica2br: XXXXXX! É o som de uma explosão.

jogo.dica1: This is a Capcom videogame first released in arcades on 1985. It is known for being one of the most difficult classic games ever made.
jogo.dica2: Join a knight named Sir Arthur in his quest to save a princess from a demon. When Arthur is hit while he's wearing his armor, he loses all clothing execpt for his underwear.

jogo.dica1: This is a famous point-and-click adventure released on 1993 for PC. It was the best selling PC game until The Sims was released on 2002.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is the Stranger, who uses a special book to travel to a mysterious island. There, he must use other books, written by an artisan named Atrus, to travel to other worlds named "Ages".

jogo.dica1: This is a platform game released fro the NES on 1986. It is an adaptation of an arcade game named Wonder Boy.
jogo.dica2: The player controls Master Higgins, a young man who ventured to an island in the South Pacific after hearing that the Evil Witch Doctor kidnapped Princess Leilani.

jogo.dica1: This is a puzzle game developed by Disney and released for Mobiles on 2011. This game has a spinoff featuring Perry the Platipus (from Phineas and Ferb) and another featuring Mickey Mouse.
jogo.dica2: Swampy, the alligator, wants to take a bath and the player must dig through the dirt to direct the water to Swampy's bathtub.

jogo.dica1: This game was created by Square and released on 1987. It was Square's final chance to profit before going bankrupt. Luckily for Square, the game was a success.
jogo.dica2: This is a famous fantasy RPG first released for NES, and then turned into a franchise. This is Square's most famous intelectual property.

jogo.dica1: This is a MMORPG published by Aeria Games and released on 2009.
jogo.dica2: This MMORPG is known for each player having a special pet called a Sprite. Each Sprite has different abilities to help the player such as crafting itens, mining for materials or hunting.

jogo.dica1: This is a Playstation-exclusive action-adventure game first released for the PS3 on 2009.
jogo.dica2: THe player controls the protagonist Cole MacGrath, a bike messenger caught in the center of an explosion that devastates several city blocks of the fictional Empire City. The explosion sends the city into chaos while Cole finds himself with new electricity-based super powers.

jogo.dica1: This is a survival-horror series first released on 2008 for PC, Xbox 360 and Playstation 3. This game is known for not having a HUD (Heads-Up Display). All information concerning health, ammo or objectives is displayed through holograms and visual feedback inside the game's universe.
jogo.dica2: This game's main character is an engineer named Isaac Clarke who has to fight against reanimated human corpses, named Necromorphs, inside a spaceship.

jogo.dica1: "The Kid", the main character, has to fight enemies and collect weapons to try to stop the Calamity from happening.
jogo.dica2: This indie PC game is known for featuring a dynamic voiceover narrator talking about the action and the story at all times.

jogo.dica1: This game is so bad that there is an urban legend that millions of copies of this game were buried in New Mexico, because it sold poorly.
jogo.dica2: This Atari 2600 video game is based on a movie directed by Steven Spielberg.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo é tão ruim que há uma lenda urbana que diz que milhões de unidades dele foram enterradas no Novo México, devido a suas fracas vendas.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo de Atari 2600 é baseado em um filme de Steven Spielberg.

jogo.dica1: This Nintendo tactical strategy game was released for Game Boy Advance on 2001.
jogo.dica2: This game allows the player to choose between various commanding officers to their army. Each army represents a different nation, such as the "Orange Star", the "Blue Moon" and the "Yellow Comet".
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de estratégia tática da Nintendo lançado para Game Boy Advance em 2001.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo permite que o jogador escolha entre vários comandantes para seu exército. Cada exército representa uma nação diferente, como a "Orange Star", a "Blue Moon" e a "Yellow Comet".

jogo.dica1: This is a Capcom survival-horror game first released in 2006 for the Xbox. The main character must take pictures to document a zombie outbreak and earn "Prestige Points" based on the quality of the photo.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is a photographer named Frank West that ends up trapped in a shopping mall filled with zombies. He can use every object he finds as a weapon to try to survive.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um jogo de survival-horror da Capcom lançado em 2006 para Xbox. O protagonista deste jogo deve tirar fotos para documentar um ataque zumbi e ganhar pontos de prestígio dependendo da qualidade das fotos.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo é um fotógrafo chamado Frank West que se encontra preso em um shopping cheio de zumbis. Ele pode usar todo objeto que encontrar como arma para tentar sobreviver.

jogo.dica1: This MOBA game was released for PC on 2014 and features a unique third-person perspective instead of the common top-down view used in most MOBAs.
jogo.dica2: In this game, various gods from different mythologies gather and fight each other on different game modes such as the "Arena", "Conquest" and "Joust".
jogo.dica1br: Este MOBA foi lançado para PC em 2014 e apresenta perspectiva em terceira pessoa, ao contrário da maioria dos MOBAs, que apresentam perspectiva top-down.
jogo.dica2br: Neste jogo, deuses de diversas mitologias se reunem e lutam em diferentes modos de jogo, como o "Arena", o "Joust" e o "Conquest".

jogo.dica1: This game is a point-and-click adventure made by LucasArts and released in 1998. It was directed by Tim Schafer.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist name is called Manny Calavera and works as a Grim Reaper in the Land of the Dead.
jogo.dica1br: Este jogo é um point-and-click de aventura feito pela Lucas Arts e lançado em 1998. Ele foi dirigido pot Tim Schafer.
jogo.dica2br: O protagonista deste jogo se chama Manny Calavera e trabalha como um "Grim Reaper" na Land of the Dead.

jogo.dica1: "Mah boy. This peace is what all true warriors strive for."
jogo.dica2: "Join me Link, and I'll make your face the greatest in Koridai. Or else you will DIE!"
jogo.dica1br: "Mah boy. This peace is what all true warriors strive for."
jogo.dica2br: "Join me Link, and I'll make your face the greatest in Koridai. Or else you will DIE!"

jogo.dica1: This is a famous Sega game released for Sega Saturn on 1996. It had a sequel for the Nintendo Wii on 2007.
jogo.dica2: This game's setting is a dream world divided between the good "Nightopia" and the bad "Nightmare". The main character's most important ability is flying.
jogo.dica1br: Este é um famoso jogo da Sega lançado para Sega Saturn em 1996. Uma sequência foi lançada para Wii em 2007.
jogo.dica2br: Este jogo é ambientado em um mundo de sonhos dividido entre a boa "Nightopia" e a má "Nightmare". A habilidade principal do protagonista é voar.

jogo.dica1: This Game Boy Advance strategy RPG's story unfolds in the land of Ivalice where four children , named Marche, Doned, Ritz and Mewt, must explore and fight to find a way back into their own reality.
jogo.dica2: This tactical RPG features many different races such as the Bangaa, the Viera, the Humans, the Nu Mou and the Moogles.
jogo.dica1br: Este RPG estratégico de Game Boy Advance conta a história de quatro crianças chamadas Marche, Doned, Ritz e Mewt, que precisam explorar o mágico mundo de Ivalice para voltar para sua realidade.
jogo.dica2br: Este RPG tático apresenta muitas raças diferentes como os Bangaa, as Viera, os humanos, os Nu Mou e os Moogles.

jogo.dica1: Face fighters from around the world by combining fighting skills with super-powers.
jogo.dica2: "Hadouken!"
jogo.dica1br: Enfrente lutadores de diferentes partes do globo combinando habilidades de combate com super-poderes.
jogo.dica2br: "Hadouken!"

jogo.dica1: This fighting game was released for the Sega Genesis in 1994. It is considered one of the worst games ever made.
jogo.dica2: This game's protagonist is basketball player Shaquille O'Neal.
